review_text: As described, read all the reviews and decided to replace my leaking old Krupps with this one and do not regret the decision.  My DH loves coffee ice cream but it is hard to find where we live so I have to make it for him and this is the easy way to do it.  Next I will try the recipe for Nutella gelato or peach ice cream.  The grandkids love to help make and eat our creations.
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
